member.name: T:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.CodeExampleAttribute
member.summary: This class maintains the structure of our code example documentation attribute

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.CodeExampleAttribute.Language
member.summary: This property contains the tag name to use

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.CodeExampleAttribute.Path
member.summary: This property contains the file path to the code example

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.CodeExampleAttribute.PathIsAbsolute
member.summary: This property denotes whether or not the path is an absolute path

member.name: M:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.CodeExampleAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method instantiates our attribute with a language and file path
member.param: The language the example is written in

member.name: T:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.MarkdownDocumentationAttribute
member.summary: This class maintains the structure of our Documentation Markdown attribute which provides a way to tag a class or section to a tag name with documentation contained in a Markdown file.

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.MarkdownDocumentationAttribute.Path
member.summary: This property contains the path to the markdown file

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.MarkdownDocumentationAttribute.PathIsAbsolute
member.summary: This property denotes whether the path to the markdown file is absolute or not

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.MarkdownDocumentationAttribute.Tag
member.summary: This property contains the name of the tag to associate the description with

member.name: M:SyncStream.Documentation.Attribute.MarkdownDocumentationAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method instantiates our attribute with a tag name and path to the markdown file
member.param: The file path to the markdown documentation
The tag name the description belongs to

member.name: T:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration
member.summary: This class maintains the configuration values for the SyncStream.Documentation library

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.DocumentationIndex
member.summary: This property contains the file path or HTML for the ReDoc index

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.HostUrl
member.summary: This property contains the host url where Swagger and ReDoc will live

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.IncludeXmlComments
member.summary: This property denotes whether to include the application's XML comments or not

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.License
member.summary: This property contains the software license

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.Logo
member.summary: This property contains the URL or file path to the URL

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.Path
member.summary: This property contains the path Swagger/ReDoc will be accessible at

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.TermsOfService
member.summary: This property contains the URL to the terms of service for the application

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.Title
member.summary: This property contains the application title to be displayed for the documentation

member.name: P:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.Version
member.summary: This property contains the version of the API

member.name: M:SyncStream.Documentation.Configuration.DocumentationConfiguration.GetPath
member.summary: This method returns the path to the Swagger UI

member.name: T:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense
member.summary: This enum defines our license enum values

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.Apache20
member.summary: This enum value defines the Apache 2.0 License

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.Bsd2Clause
member.summary: This enum value defines the BSD 2-Clause "Simplified" or "FreeBSD" license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.Bsd3Clause
member.summary: This enum value defines the BSD 3-Clause "New" or "Revised" license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.CDDL10
member.summary: This enum value defines the Common Development and Distribution License

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.EPL20
member.summary: This enum value defines the Eclipse Public License version 2.0 license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.GPL
member.summary: This enum value defines the GNU General Public License (GPL) license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.LGPL
member.summary: This enum value defines the GNU Library or "Lesser" General Public License (LGPL) license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.MIT
member.summary: This enum value defines the MIT license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.MPL20
member.summary: This enum value defines the Mozilla Public License 2.0 license

member.name: F:SyncStream.Documentation.DocumentationLicense.Proprietary
member.summary: This enum value defines a proprietary license
